citingPaper.title: Single‐cell transcriptomics analysis of mild cognitive impairment in World Trade Center disaster responders
citingPaper.abstract: Recent research has found that World Trade Center (WTC) responders in their mid‐50s have an elevated prevalence of mild cognitive impairment (MCI) that is associated with neural degeneration and subcortical thinning. This article extends our understanding of the molecular complexity of MCI through gene expression profiling of blood.
